entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. Temperature falling to minus 7 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this morning then cloudy. Risk of freezing drizzle early this morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature falling to minus 7 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 10 this morning and minus 15 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023
